name: JumpCurse
description:
This is the first time i made a 2d platformer so i was not sure what i can do in 7 days.

DAY 1:

-Found idea

-Made a simple prototype to see if the idea was fun

DAY 2

-Made movement,reversed_time ,platform,manager,transition   scripts 

DAY 3

-Made the character+Animations

Day 4

-Made the rest of the sprites

DAY 5

-Made the level

DAY 6

-Fixing glitches

-Added Hints

-Made simple Main menu and Ending screen

-Made sounds

DAY 7

-Playtesting

-Upload

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHAT COULD I DO BETTER:

-Jumping

I did not have the time to make jumping feel more responsive

-More levels+content

The making of the sprites and animation took a lot of time as i am not familiar with ps 

so i could not add more content as i felt i was not going to finish the game

-Platform glitch where you go faster  if you go to the same direction as the platform

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope you enjoy my game

Looking forward to play your games!!!
